beauty.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a quality that people, places, or things have that makes them very attractive to look at
beauty.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: an area of outstanding natural beauty
Millions of dollars are spent each year on beauty products.
beauty.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a woman who is very beautiful
beauty.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She was considered a great beauty in her youth.
beauty.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a quality that something such as a poem, song, emotion etc has that gives you pleasure or joy
beauty.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a very good, large etc example of something
beauty.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: You should have seen the boat – a real beauty.
beauty.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: the quality of being very attractive to look at – used about people, objects, and places
She was greatly admired for her beauty and intelligence.
the natural beauty of the landscape.
The Ancient Greeks created statues of outstanding beauty and dignity.
someone’s attractive appearance, especially their face and features
With his dark good looks, Jason could have been a film star.
an exciting quality which makes someone or something seem attractive and connected with wealth and success
Men loved her for her beauty and her glamour.
Add a black lace top for a touch of glamour.
connected with beauty and the study of beauty
The aesthetic value of their work is easy to appreciate.
the declining aesthetic standards of our civilization
The aesthetic qualities in a Buddhist sculpture are similar to those in any other work of art.
